input.sentences: i spent all day out on the farm .
i could see the house in the distance .
there was a lot of land out here .
when i got back to the house i was very hungry .
output.sentences: I love taking drives out to the country sometimes.
It seems like the grass and fields go on forever out there.
I like to daydream about owning a big ranch house and farming.
It would be a total dream to live quietly and peacefully, growing food.
I always have to come back into the city though, and back to reality.
